title: Identifying Given Values
text: Identify the initial term, a1, which is given as part of the formula. This is the first term.

title: Finding Next Terms
text: To find the second term, a2, substitute the initial term into the formula for an-1. Solve. Repeat until you have solved for the 5th term.

title: First 5 Terms of Sequence
text: What are the first 5 terms of the sequence?
